last_episode_to_air.name: Boring Back Yard to Magical Forest in Blackpool & Bristol
last_episode_to_air.overview: In Blackpool, Alex dreams of turning her boring back yard into a magical enchanted forest.

name: Big Dreams Small Spaces
overview: Monty Don, one of Britain's favourite gardeners, has spent the last year working with enthusiasts up and down the country to help them create the garden of their dreams. He has listened to their plans, he has given them advice and he has rolled up his sleeves to help make their dreams come true. But it's not an easy task and there have been times when it all seemed nothing more than a pipe dream.

episodes.name: Cadeby & Sussex
episodes.overview: A couple battle to turn a clay-clogged building site in Sussex into a piece of Portugal.

episodes.name: Swindon & Wakefield
episodes.overview: A truck driver wants to create an outside space for his burgeoning family to enjoy.

episodes.name: Corris & Hayling
episodes.overview: Monty Don tackles a garden ravaged by salty winds and a mountainside garden in Snowdonia.

episodes.name: Doncaster & Walthamstow
episodes.overview: Two families plan gardens that are as much for the children as for the adults.

episodes.name: Bromley & Dorset
episodes.overview: Plans include a Norwegian garden complete with waterfalls.

episodes.name: Barnet & Salisbury
episodes.overview: Glenn and Zoe want a new garden and are desperate to produce flowers for their wedding.

episodes.name: Clapham & Hereford
episodes.overview: Frankie is trying to renovate her cottage garden with the help of her mother Pat.

episodes.name: Bromley & Stoke
episodes.overview: Two artists hope to transform their tiny concrete yard into a haven of tranquillity.

episodes.name: Oxford & Pewsey
episodes.overview: Can two gardening enthusiasts with definite ideas of their own manage to work together?

episodes.name: Hitchin & Worthing
episodes.overview: Monty Don helps create a garden for a couple whose son has Down's syndrome.

episodes.name: Billericay & Teddington
episodes.overview: Monty Don helps a mother create a garden inspired by Alice in Wonderland for her daughter.

episodes.name: Feel-Good Spaces in Brighton & High Wycombe
episodes.overview: Monty advises a married couple on creating a garden suitable for a special needs child.

episodes.name: Garden Suitable for Entertaining in Leyton & Bath
episodes.overview: Monty helps replicate a Japanese garden in Bath.

episodes.name: Unimaginable Ambitions for Outdoor Spaces in Essex & Ipswich
episodes.overview: Monty helps build a terraced allotment on a steep slope in the middle of a wood.

episodes.name: Rubble Filled Gardens in Stockport & Tufnell Park
episodes.overview: Monty comes to the rescue of two couples with rubble-filled back gardens.

episodes.name: Garden Transformations in Bury & Hackney
episodes.overview: Monty Don visits two sets of gardeners, each facing challenges on a very different scale.

episodes.name: Boring Back Yard to Magical Forest in Blackpool & Bristol
episodes.overview: In Blackpool, Alex dreams of turning her boring back yard into a magical enchanted forest.
